model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class represent the memory of the board, providing method for change it.
    Author:
    Nicola Gemo

    • Method Detail

      • getBoard

        public State[][] getBoard()
        return the board array
        Returns:
        The board array

      • move

        public State move(int x1,
                  int y1,
                  int x2,
                  int y2)
        Execute the move changing the board, in the end check for winners
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x coordinate of the starting point
        y1 - the y coordinate of the starting point
        x2 - the x coordinate of the final point
        y2 - the y coordinate of the final point
        Returns:
        State.E if nobody wins, or State.B, State.W is there is a winner

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(int x1,
                           int y1,
                           int x2,
                           int y2)
        Check if the move is valid
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x coordinate of the starting point
        y1 - the y coordinate of the starting point
        x2 - the x coordinate of the final point
        y2 - the y coordinate of the final point
        Returns:
        True if the move is valid, false otherwise

      • isWin

        private State isWin()
        Check if somebody wins
        Returns:
        State.E if nobody wins, or State.B, State.W is there is a winner

        public State getMyColor()
        Return the color of the player

        Return the color of the player
